conversations.content: How many appointments do I have today?

<function_thought>
To determine how many appointments Emma Johnson has today, I first need to find the current date by calling the function `get_current_day`. Once I have the date, I can call the function `get_day_calendar_events` to retrieve the appointments for that specific day. After that, I will be able to count the appointments.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_current_day()]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

</function_thought>

<final_answer></final_answer>
